text: Saving Shiloh is a 2006 American family drama movie directed by Sandy Tung, based on the book of the same name written by Phyllis Reynolds Naylor. It is the third and final film in the trilogy, whose other members are Shiloh and Shiloh Season. title: Saving Shiloh
